testcase.name: REST API Testing
testcase.system-out: Given url "http://dummy.restapiexample.com/api/v1/employees" .............. passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match responseType == "json" .......................................... passed And assert responseTime <= 1000 ........................................... passed * match response.status == "success" ...................................... passed * match response.status == "#string" ...................................... passed * match response.data == "#array" ......................................... passed * print response.data[0].employee_name .................................... passed * match response.data[0].employee_name == "Tiger Nixon" ................... passed
